Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the base of a drab-coloured pottery vessel with section of foot-ring surviving, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a red-slip and the base is incised with one line of Coptic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394784) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394784)
